H0.text: Which country is the world's largest producer of copper. Peru

H1.text: Which country is the world's largest producer of copper. Australia

H2.text: Which country is the world's largest producer of copper. China

H3.text: Which country is the world's largest producer of copper. Cile

A4.text: Chile was, in 2019, the world's largest producer of copper

A5.text: Peru was, in 2019, the world's second largest producer of copper
